name: Can You Make It, Count Dracula?
name_original: Can You Make It, Count Dracula?
description:
Story:

You play as Count Dracula. You need to make an emergency deposit to The Blood Bank, but OH NO!!! You seem to have lost track of time and the bank is closing soon!

Can you make it there before times up? 

Be careful though, vampire hunters have been seen in the area. 

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement 

W, Up arrow, or Spacebar - Jump 

Left Click or J - Shoot Blood clot (projectile) 

Right Click or K - Shoot Blood Wave (special attack)

F - Transform into a bat

---While in bat form: Press the jump button multiple times in order to fly

Important Game Mechanics:

  • You can only deposit the blood that you have. Try to make it to the end with as much as possible for a higher score!
  • Using your attacks will drain a portion of your health, so don't be wasteful!
  • While flying in bat form, you don't have proper protection from the sun, so you will take constant damage, use bat form wisely!
  • Killing enemies supplies their blood to your health pool, but don't take too long!
